oai_dc:dc.dc:description: According to a note on f. 57v, copy completed in the hand of Muṣṭafá in Shawwāl 1067 AH [July 1657 AD]
بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم وصلى الله على سيدنا محمد وعلى اله وصحبه اجمعين يقول السبتي ويحمد ربه... :Incipit
Written in one column, from 12 to 13 lines per page, in black and red.
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 20.1 x 14.8 cm. (16.5 x 10 cm.).
MS Arab 190. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Geomancy
Divination--Arab countries
